channel.title: PI custom skillcape emotes
channel.description:
im sick of trying to add the real skillcape emotes cuz each time they just mess up my other animations, so, does anyone happen to have a configuration of custom skillcape emotes? go ahead and rage on me for asking, but i just want any type of skillcape emote now :s
~Thanks in advance, L0lc0pt3r

item.title: PI custom skillcape emotes
item.dc:creator: @l0lc0pt3r l0lc0pt3r
item.description:
@l0lc0pt3r wrote:

everytime i add any revision skillcape, the emotes mess up other animations in the game. aka, why i want customs ;]

Read full topic

item.title: PI custom skillcape emotes
item.dc:creator: @Demon6994 Demon6994
item.description:
@Demon6994 wrote:

Get them from a 508. That’s how I did it with my old PI source I used. I haven’t added skillcape emotes to my PI… But I did it before.

Read full topic
